tasks.title: ✅ Mission Control Setup Complete
tasks.description:
Mission Control has been deployed. This is your task management dashboard.

**How it works:**
1. Create tasks here or on the dashboard
2. Move tasks to 'In Progress' — Clawson automatically starts working
3. Clawson updates progress, marks subtasks done
4. Task moves to 'Review' when complete
5. You approve or send back for rework

comments.author: Clawson
comments.text: Setup completed Feb 5, 2026. Dashboard live at massdwell.github.io/mission-control
